languages.text: {n}Ноздри мужчины яростно раздуваются. Кое-как справившись с эмоциями, он произносит:{/n} "Даже если ты настаиваешь на моем возвращении, это не меняет главного — я больше не годен для службы Лексу. Для арбитра, неспособного выполнять долг, приговор один".

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."
languages.original_text: {n}Ноздри мужчины яростно раздуваются. Кое-как справившись с эмоциями, он произносит:{/n} "Даже если ты настаиваешь на моем возвращении, это не меняет главного — я больше не годен для службы Лексу. Для арбитра, неспособного выполнять долг, приговор один".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Having barely regained control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the important thing — I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

{n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Nasenflügel beben vor Wut. Er kann seine Gefühle kaum unter Kontrolle halten und murmelt:{/n} "Selbst wenn Ihr auf meiner Rückkehr besteht, ändert das nichts an der zentralen Tatsche, dass ich nicht länger geeignet bin, dem Lex zu dienen. Für einen Arbitrator, der seine Pflicht nicht erfüllen kann, gibt es nur ein Urteil."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Nasenflügel beben vor Wut. Er kann seine Gefühle kaum unter Kontrolle halten und murmelt:{/n} "Selbst wenn Ihr auf meiner Rückkehr besteht, ändert das nichts an der zentralen Tatsche, dass ich nicht länger geeignet bin, dem Lex zu dienen. Für einen Arbitrator, der seine Pflicht nicht erfüllen kann, gibt es nur ein Urteil."

languages.text: {n}Les narines de Solomorne se dilatent sous l'effet de la colère. Il marmonne, peinant à maîtriser ses émotions :{/n} « Vous avez beau insister pour que je revienne, cela ne changera pas le fait que je ne peux plus servir la Lex. Je suis un arbitrator incapable d'accomplir son devoir. Je suis condamné. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les narines de Solomorne se dilatent sous l'effet de la colère. Il marmonne, peinant à maîtriser ses émotions :{/n} « Vous avez beau insister pour que je revienne, cela ne changera pas le fait que je ne peux plus servir la Lex. Je suis un arbitrator incapable d'accomplir son devoir. Je suis condamné. »

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙愤怒地撑大了鼻孔，低声开了口，几乎无法克制住自己的情绪。{/n}“即便你坚持要我回来，我也不再适合为帝国律法服务，没人能改变这个关键事实。对无法履行职责的法务官而言，应得的裁决只有一种。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙愤怒地撑大了鼻孔，低声开了口，几乎无法克制住自己的情绪。{/n}“即便你坚持要我回来，我也不再适合为帝国律法服务，没人能改变这个关键事实。对无法履行职责的法务官而言，应得的裁决只有一种。”

languages.text: {n}La furia hincha las fosas nasales de Solomorne. Murmura, apenas capaz de controlar sus emociones:{/n} «Aunque insista en que regrese, eso no cambia el hecho crucial de que ya no soy apto para servir a la Lex. Para un Arbitrator que no puede realizar sus funciones, solo hay un veredicto».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

traits.locale_text: {n}La furia hincha las fosas nasales de Solomorne. Murmura, apenas capaz de controlar sus emociones:{/n} «Aunque insista en que regrese, eso no cambia el hecho crucial de que ya no soy apto para servir a la Lex. Para un Arbitrator que no puede realizar sus funciones, solo hay un veredicto».

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは怒りでの鼻の穴が膨らんだ。かろうじて感情を制御しながら、彼はつぶやく。{/n}「たとえあなたが私の復帰を主張しても、私がもはやレックスに仕える資格がないという重要な事実は変わりません。職務を遂行すらできないアービトレイターには、一つの判決しかありません」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは怒りでの鼻の穴が膨らんだ。かろうじて感情を制御しながら、彼はつぶやく。{/n}「たとえあなたが私の復帰を主張しても、私がもはやレックスに仕える資格がないという重要な事実は変わりません。職務を遂行すらできないアービトレイターには、一つの判決しかありません」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne öfkeyle burnundan soluyor. Duygularını güçlükle dizginleyerek homurdanıyor.{/n} "Dönmemde ısrar etseniz bile bu artık Lex'e hizmet edebilecek durumda olmadığım gerçeğini değiştirmeyecek. Görevini yerine getiremeyen bir Yargıcı içinse tek bir hüküm vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's nostrils flare in anger. Barely regaining control of his emotions, he mutters,{/n} "Even if you insist on my return, that won't change the crucial fact that I am no longer fit to serve the Lex. For an Arbitrator who cannot perform his duties, there is only one verdict."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, öfkeyle burnundan solur. Duygularını güçlükle dizginleyerek homurdanır:{/n} "Dönmemde ısrar etseniz bile bu artık Lex'e hizmet edebilecek durumda olmadığım gerçeğini değiştirmeyecek. Görevini yerine getiremeyen bir Yargıcı içinse tek bir hüküm vardır."
